Description:
Our client is into the Entertainment industry. They are now looking for Visual Merchandiser.            Roles & Responsibilities: Execution of all Visual Merchandise projects including product launch and store display.
Conceptualize and implement window dressings and presentation of store displays and  window dressing to help stimulate guest sales activity.
Implementation of floor sets, merchandise flows and product placement within each retail store.
Prepare store bubble plans and SKU to fixture plan.
Responsible for ordering and tracking of all visual merchandise collateral's.
Maintain good store Visual Merchandising standards and providing training to store team.Skills
Skills:
3 years visual merchandising experience in Retail Environment
Hands on experience in store setup and window displays 
Preferably has theme park retail operations experience
Has managed and planned for store openings

Degree in Arts, Design or Visual Merchandising
Be interested in art and design
PC Literate: Microsoft Office, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop
Organized and able to multi-task
